overview: CockyBoys & Pink X invite you on a trip to Paris where three models embark on sexual adventures instigated by Sean Ford, The Scandalous Boy. Seemingly aloof Sean is inspired by a famous gravestone visit to make the most of their Paris Fashion Week trip by issuing a challenge to his fellow models Cory Kane & Ben Masters. They're all to make old school sexual conquests "fairly & without restrictions, on the street & in the dark". Featuring Carter Dane, Levi Karter, Damian Grey and FrenchTwinks models Chris Loan, Paul Delay & Doryann Marguet, Le Garcon Scandaleux follows the raucous of beautiful boys in the city of Paris!
title: Le garçon scandaleux
